meanings.definition: A place of fabulous wealth or opportunity.
meanings.sent1: The small town was known as an eldorados for those seeking fortune.
meanings.sent2: Many believed the hidden valley to be an eldorados of gold and jewels.
meanings.sent3: The children imagined the playground to be an eldorados filled with endless toys.
meanings.sent4: To her, the library was an eldorados of knowledge waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The old map promised an eldorados beyond the mountains, waiting to be found.

meanings.definition: A source of great wealth or prosperity.
meanings.sent1: The successful business became an eldorados for investors looking to grow their wealth.
meanings.sent2: She saw the stock market as an eldorados of opportunities to increase her prosperity.
meanings.sent3: The garden was an eldorados of ripe fruits and vegetables, ready to be harvested.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, education was the ultimate eldorados for a brighter future.
meanings.sent5: The wise man shared his secret eldorados of happiness with those around him.
